original_text: It is the duty of every special priest to offer gifts and sacrifices to God. So Jesus, as our special priest, must also have something to offer.
korean_text: 대제사장마다 예물과 제사 드림을 위하여 세운 자니 그러므로 그도 무엇인가 드릴 것이 있어야 할지니라

sentences.original_text: It is the duty of every special priest
to offer gifts and sacrifices to God
So Jesus, as our special priest
must also have something to offer
